si.title: Prima triumphs at National Supply Chain Excellence Awards for 2nd consecutive year
body_lines: Prima Group Sri Lanka Ceylon Agro Industries General Manager Sajith Gunaratne receiving the Special Commendation Award at the National Awards of Excellence for the Best Supply Chain Practicing Organisation in the Large Scale category from Special Guest International Federation of Purchasing and Supply Management CEO Markku Henttinen, and Chief Guest International Federation of Purchasing and Supply Management President Eng. Chris Oanda, in the presence of officials of the Institute of Supply and Materials Management and Ceylon Agro Industries Ltd., Prima Group Sri Lanka

Ceylon Agro Industries (CAI) Ltd. (ප්රීමා සමූහය ශ්රී ලංකාව) හොඳම සැපයුම් දාම ප්රායෝගික සංවිධානයේ ජාතික සම්මානය සහ විශේෂ ප්රශංසා සම්මානයක් සහ 2024 ජාතික සැපයුම් දාම විශිෂ්ටතා සම්මාන උළෙලේදී විශේෂ ප්රශංසා සම්මානයක් සමඟ ගෞරවයක් දැක්වීය.

Organised by the Institute of Supply and Materials Management in partnership with the Ministry of Industries and the Industrial Development Board, these accolades recognise industry leaders who exemplify best practices in supply chain management.

Ceylon Agro Industries (Prima Group Sri Lanka) distinguished itself through a dedicated focus on advanced technology and robust risk management strategies, which have bolstered its resilience and adaptability within the fast-paced FMCG sector. The company’s leadership has cultivated a culture of innovation within its supply chain, logistics, and warehouse teams, empowering employees to drive continuous improvements in processes.

ප්රීමා සමූහයේ ශ්රී ලංකා සිලෝන් කෘෂි ඉන්ඩස්ට්රීස් සාමාන්යාධිකාරී සජිත් ගුණරත්න මහතා විශේෂ ප්රශංසා සම්මානය හිමි විය. ඔහුගේ පිළිගැනීමේ ප්රකාශය තුළ, "අඛණ්ඩව දෙවන වරටත් හොඳම සැපයුම් දාම පුහුණුවීම් සඳහා වූ විශිෂ්ටතා සම්මානය ලබා දීම ගැන අපි බෙහෙවින් නිහතමානීව කටයුතු කරන්නෙමු.. මෙම ජයග්රහණය අපගේ කැපවීමට පමණක් නොව, මෙම පිළිගැනීම ලබා ගැනීමට වැදගත් කාර්යභාරයක් ඉටු කළ අපගේ කැපවීමට පමණක් නොව, අපගේ සැපයුම්කරුවන්ගේ සහ සේවා සපයන්නන්ගේ අගනා දායකත්වය ද වේ. We are committed to upholding our industry leadership and continuing to pursue excellence in all that we do.”

Ceylon Agro Industries (Prima Group Sri Lanka) provides a wide range of popular value-added food products, including wheat-based goods, poultry items, dairy products, and agricultural products. Known for quality, convenience, and affordability, its products are designed to meet the needs of Sri Lanka’s diverse consumer base. The Company said this prestigious award is a testament to Ceylon Agro Industries (Prima Group Sri Lanka)’s unwavering commitment to excellence in supply chain management and its ongoing contributions to shaping the future of the food industry in Sri Lanka.

ta.title: தொடர்ச்சியாக 2 வது ஆண்டாக தேசிய விநியோக சங்கிலி சிறப்பான விருதுகளில் ப்ரிமா வெற்றிகள்
body_lines: Prima Group Sri Lanka Ceylon Agro Industries General Manager Sajith Gunaratne receiving the Special Commendation Award at the National Awards of Excellence for the Best Supply Chain Practicing Organisation in the Large Scale category from Special Guest International Federation of Purchasing and Supply Management CEO Markku Henttinen, and Chief Guest International Federation of Purchasing and Supply Management President Eng. கிறிஸ் ஓண்டா, வழங்கல் மற்றும் பொருட்கள் மேலாண்மை மற்றும் இலங்கை அக்ரோ இண்டஸ்ட்ரீஸ் லிமிடெட் நிறுவனத்தின் அதிகாரிகள் முன்னிலையில், ப்ரிமா குழு இலங்கை

சிலோன் அக்ரோ இண்டஸ்ட்ரீஸ் (CAI) லிமிடெட். (Prima Group Sri Lanka) was honoured with the National Award of Excellence for Best Supply Chain Practising Organisation, along with a Special Commendation Award in the Large Scale Commendation category, at the National Supply Chain Excellence Awards 2024.

தொழில்துறை அமைச்சகம் மற்றும் தொழில்துறை மேம்பாட்டு வாரியத்துடன் இணைந்து வழங்கல் மற்றும் பொருட்கள் மேலாண்மை நிறுவனம் ஏற்பாடு செய்துள்ள இந்த பாராட்டுகள், விநியோக சங்கிலி நிர்வாகத்தில் சிறந்த நடைமுறைகளை எடுத்துக்காட்டுகின்ற தொழில் தலைவர்களை அங்கீகரிக்கின்றன.

Ceylon Agro Industries (Prima Group Sri Lanka) distinguished itself through a dedicated focus on advanced technology and robust risk management strategies, which have bolstered its resilience and adaptability within the fast-paced FMCG sector. The company’s leadership has cultivated a culture of innovation within its supply chain, logistics, and warehouse teams, empowering employees to drive continuous improvements in processes.

Prima Group Sri Lanka Ceylon Agro Industries General Manager Sajith Gunaratne received the Special Commendation Award. In his acceptance remarks, he shared, “We are deeply humbled and honoured to receive the National Award of Excellence for Best Supply Chain Practising Organisation for the second consecutive year. This achievement is a testament not only to our dedication but also to the invaluable contributions of our suppliers and service providers, who have played a vital role in making this recognition possible. We are committed to upholding our industry leadership and continuing to pursue excellence in all that we do.”

சிலோன் அக்ரோ இண்டஸ்ட்ரீஸ் (ப்ரிமா குழும இலங்கை) கோதுமை சார்ந்த பொருட்கள், கோழி பொருட்கள், பால் பொருட்கள் மற்றும் விவசாய பொருட்கள் உள்ளிட்ட பிரபலமான மதிப்பு கூட்டப்பட்ட உணவுப் பொருட்களை வழங்குகிறது. Known for quality, convenience, and affordability, its products are designed to meet the needs of Sri Lanka’s diverse consumer base. The Company said this prestigious award is a testament to Ceylon Agro Industries (Prima Group Sri Lanka)’s unwavering commitment to excellence in supply chain management and its ongoing contributions to shaping the future of the food industry in Sri Lanka.
